column3: Traffic;Phnom Penh: A------ driver of a Prius hit a divider near the construction site for the flyover in Chom Chao at 2 am on Tuesday
column7: was taken away by ambulance.------Sources at the scene said they first saw the unmarked vehicle driving along highway. 4  from the west
column8: and it slammed into the concrete barrier. The driver appeared to be seriously injured. ------RASMEI
